meanings.definition: To give birth to a litter of pigs.
meanings.sent1: The sow will farrow soon, and we'll have more piglets.
meanings.sent2: The mama pig will farrow in the cozy barn.
meanings.sent3: The pig was surprised to farrow a large litter of piglets.
